24  package org.hibernate.test.cache.infinispan.functional.classloader;
25  
26  import javax.transaction.TransactionManager;
27  
28  import org.infinispan.Cache;
29  import org.infinispan.manager.CacheContainer;
30  import org.infinispan.manager.EmbeddedCacheManager;
31  import org.jboss.logging.Logger;
32  import org.junit.AfterClass;
33  import org.junit.BeforeClass;
34  import org.junit.Ignore;
35  import org.junit.Test;
36  
37  import org.hibernate.SessionFactory;
38  import org.hibernate.cache.infinispan.InfinispanRegionFactory;
39  import org.hibernate.cache.internal.StandardQueryCache;
40  import org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration;
41  import org.hibernate.test.cache.infinispan.functional.cluster.ClusterAwareRegionFactory;
42  import org.hibernate.test.cache.infinispan.functional.cluster.DualNodeJtaTransactionManagerImpl;
43  import org.hibernate.test.cache.infinispan.functional.cluster.DualNodeTestCase;
44  
45  import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
46  import static org.junit.Assert.fail;
47  
48  /**
49   * Tests entity and query caching when class of objects being cached are not visible to Infinispan's classloader. Also serves as a
50   * general integration test.
51   * <p/>
52   * This test stores an object (AccountHolder) that isn't visible to the Infinispan classloader in the cache in two places: 1) As
53   * part of the value tuple in an Account entity 2) As part of the FQN in a query cache entry (see query in
54   * ClassLoaderTestDAO.getBranch())
55   *
56   * @author Galder Zamarre√±o
57   * @since 3.5
58   */
59  public class IsolatedClassLoaderTest extends DualNodeTestCase {
60  	private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger( IsolatedClassLoaderTest.class );
61  
62  	protected static final long SLEEP_TIME = 300L;
63  
64  	private Cache localQueryCache;
65  	private CacheAccessListener localQueryListener;
66  
67  	private Cache remoteQueryCache;
68  	private CacheAccessListener remoteQueryListener;
69  
70     private static ClassLoader originalTCCL;
71  
72     private static ClassLoader visibleClassesCl;
73  
74  	@BeforeClass
75  	public static void prepareClassLoader() {
76        final String packageName = IsolatedClassLoaderTest.class.getPackage().getName();
77        final String[] classes = new String[] { packageName + ".Account", packageName + ".AccountHolder" };
78        originalTCCL = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader();
79        // Most likely, it will point to system classloader
80        ClassLoader parent = originalTCCL == null ? IsolatedClassLoaderTest.class.getClassLoader() : originalTCCL;
81  
82        // First, create a classloader where classes won't be found
83        ClassLoader selectedTCCL = new SelectedClassnameClassLoader(null, null, classes, parent);
84  
85        // Now, make the class visible to the test driver
86        SelectedClassnameClassLoader visible = new SelectedClassnameClassLoader(classes, null, null, selectedTCCL);
87        Thread.currentThread().setContextClassLoader(visible);
88  //      visibleClassesCl = new SelectedClassnameClassLoader(classes, null, null, selectedTCCL);
89  //      Thread.currentThread().setContextClassLoader(selectedTCCL);
90  	}
91  
92  	@AfterClass
93  	public static void resetClassLoader() {
94  		ClusterAwareRegionFactory.clearCacheManagers();
95  		DualNodeJtaTransactionManagerImpl.cleanupTransactions();
96  		DualNodeJtaTransactionManagerImpl.cleanupTransactionManagers();
97  		Thread.currentThread().setContextClassLoader( originalTCCL );
98  	}
99  
100 	@Override
101 	public String[] getMappings() {
102 		return new String[] {"cache/infinispan/functional/classloader/Account.hbm.xml"};
103 	}
104 
105 	@Override
106 	protected void standardConfigure(Configuration cfg) {
107 		super.standardConfigure( cfg );
108 		cfg.setProperty( InfinispanRegionFactory.QUERY_CACHE_RESOURCE_PROP, "replicated-query" );
109 		cfg.setProperty( "hibernate.cache.infinispan.AccountRegion.cfg", "replicated-query" );
110 	}
111 
112 	@Override
113 	protected void cleanupTransactionManagement() {
114 		// Don't clean up the managers, just the transactions
115 		// Managers are still needed by the long-lived caches
116 		DualNodeJtaTransactionManagerImpl.cleanupTransactions();
117 	}
118 
119 	@Override
120 	protected void cleanupTest() throws Exception {
121 		try {
122          // Clear the local account cache
123          sessionFactory().getCache().evictEntityRegion(Account.class.getName());
124 			if ( localQueryCache != null && localQueryListener != null ) {
125 				localQueryCache.removeListener( localQueryListener );
126 			}
127 			if ( remoteQueryCache != null && remoteQueryListener != null ) {
128 				remoteQueryCache.removeListener( remoteQueryListener );
129 			}
130 		}
131 		finally {
132 			super.cleanupTest();
133 		}
134 	}
135 
136    @Ignore("Infinispan caches now use whichever classloader is associated on " +
137            "construction, i.e. deployment JPA app, so does not rely on TCCL.")
138 	@Test
139 	public void testIsolatedSetup() throws Exception {
140 		// Bind a listener to the "local" cache
141 		// Our region factory makes its CacheManager available to us
142 		CacheContainer localManager = ClusterAwareRegionFactory.getCacheManager( DualNodeTestCase.LOCAL );
143 		Cache localReplicatedCache = localManager.getCache( "replicated-entity" );
144 
145 		// Bind a listener to the "remote" cache
146 		CacheContainer remoteManager = ClusterAwareRegionFactory.getCacheManager( DualNodeTestCase.REMOTE );
147 		Cache remoteReplicatedCache = remoteManager.getCache( "replicated-entity" );
148 
149 		ClassLoader cl = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader();
150 		Thread.currentThread().setContextClassLoader( cl.getParent() );
151 		log.info( "TCCL is " + cl.getParent() );
152 
153 		Account acct = new Account();
154 		acct.setAccountHolder( new AccountHolder() );
155 
156 		try {
157 			localReplicatedCache.put( "isolated1", acct );
158 			// With lazy deserialization, retrieval in remote forces class resolution
159 			remoteReplicatedCache.get( "isolated1" );
160 			fail( "Should not have succeeded in putting acct -- classloader not isolated" );
161 		}
162 		catch (Exception e) {
163 			if ( e.getCause() instanceof ClassNotFoundException ) {
164 				log.info( "Caught exception as desired", e );
165 			}
166 			else {
167 				throw new IllegalStateException( "Unexpected exception", e );
168 			}
169 		}
170 
171 		Thread.currentThread().setContextClassLoader( cl );
172 		log.info( "TCCL is " + cl );
173 		localReplicatedCache.put( "isolated2", acct );
174 		assertEquals( acct.getClass().getName(), remoteReplicatedCache.get( "isolated2" ).getClass().getName() );
175 	}
176 
177    @Ignore("Infinispan caches now use whichever classloader is associated on " +
178            "construction, i.e. deployment JPA app, so does not rely on TCCL.")
179 	@Test
180 	public void testClassLoaderHandlingNamedQueryRegion() throws Exception {
181       rebuildSessionFactory();
182 		queryTest( true );
183 	}
184 
185    @Ignore("Infinispan caches now use whichever classloader is associated on " +
186            "construction, i.e. deployment JPA app, so does not rely on TCCL.")
187 	@Test
188 	public void testClassLoaderHandlingStandardQueryCache() throws Exception {
189       rebuildSessionFactory();
190 		queryTest( false );
191 	}
192 
193 	protected void queryTest(boolean useNamedRegion) throws Exception {
194 		// Bind a listener to the "local" cache
195 		// Our region factory makes its CacheManager available to us
196 		EmbeddedCacheManager localManager = ClusterAwareRegionFactory.getCacheManager( DualNodeTestCase.LOCAL );
197 		// Bind a listener to the "remote" cache
198 		EmbeddedCacheManager remoteManager = ClusterAwareRegionFactory.getCacheManager( DualNodeTestCase.REMOTE );
199 		String cacheName;
200 		if ( useNamedRegion ) {
201 			cacheName = "AccountRegion"; // As defined by ClassLoaderTestDAO via calls to query.setCacheRegion
202 			// Define cache configurations for region early to avoid ending up with local caches for this region
203 			localManager.defineConfiguration(
204 					cacheName, "replicated-query", new org.infinispan.config.Configuration()
205 			);
206 			remoteManager.defineConfiguration(
207 					cacheName, "replicated-query", new org.infinispan.config.Configuration()
208 			);
209 		}
210 		else {
211 			cacheName = "replicated-query";
212 		}
213 
214 		localQueryCache = localManager.getCache( cacheName );
215 		localQueryListener = new CacheAccessListener();
216 		localQueryCache.addListener( localQueryListener );
217 
218 		TransactionManager localTM = DualNodeJtaTransactionManagerImpl.getInstance( DualNodeTestCase.LOCAL );
219 
220 		remoteQueryCache = remoteManager.getCache( cacheName );
221 		remoteQueryListener = new CacheAccessListener();
222 		remoteQueryCache.addListener( remoteQueryListener );
223 
224 		TransactionManager remoteTM = DualNodeJtaTransactionManagerImpl.getInstance( DualNodeTestCase.REMOTE );
225 
226 		SessionFactory localFactory = sessionFactory();
227 		SessionFactory remoteFactory = secondNodeEnvironment().getSessionFactory();
228 
229 		ClassLoaderTestDAO dao0 = new ClassLoaderTestDAO( localFactory, localTM );
230 		ClassLoaderTestDAO dao1 = new ClassLoaderTestDAO( remoteFactory, remoteTM );
231 
232 		// Initial ops on node 0
233 		setupEntities( dao0 );
234 
235 		String branch = "63088";
236 		// Query on post code count
237 		assertEquals( branch + " has correct # of accounts", 6, dao0.getCountForBranch( branch, useNamedRegion ) );
238 
239 		assertEquals( "Query cache used", 1, localQueryListener.getSawRegionModificationCount() );
240 		localQueryListener.clearSawRegionModification();
241 
242 //      log.info("First query (get count for branch + " + branch + " ) on node0 done, contents of local query cache are: " + TestingUtil.printCache(localQueryCache));
243 
244 		// Sleep a bit to allow async repl to happen
245 		sleep( SLEEP_TIME );
246 
247 		assertEquals( "Query cache used", 1, remoteQueryListener.getSawRegionModificationCount() );
248 		remoteQueryListener.clearSawRegionModification();
249 
250 		// Do query again from node 1
251 		log.info( "Repeat first query (get count for branch + " + branch + " ) on remote node" );
252 		assertEquals( "63088 has correct # of accounts", 6, dao1.getCountForBranch( branch, useNamedRegion ) );
253 		assertEquals( "Query cache used", 1, remoteQueryListener.getSawRegionModificationCount() );
254 		remoteQueryListener.clearSawRegionModification();
255 
256 		sleep( SLEEP_TIME );
257 
258 		assertEquals( "Query cache used", 1, localQueryListener.getSawRegionModificationCount() );
259 		localQueryListener.clearSawRegionModification();
260 
261 		log.info( "First query on node 1 done" );
262 
263 		// Sleep a bit to allow async repl to happen
264 		sleep( SLEEP_TIME );
265 
266 		// Do some more queries on node 0
267 		log.info( "Do query Smith's branch" );
268 		assertEquals( "Correct branch for Smith", "94536", dao0.getBranch( dao0.getSmith(), useNamedRegion ) );
269 		log.info( "Do query Jone's balance" );
270 		assertEquals( "Correct high balances for Jones", 40, dao0.getTotalBalance( dao0.getJones(), useNamedRegion ) );
271 
272 		assertEquals( "Query cache used", 2, localQueryListener.getSawRegionModificationCount() );
273 		localQueryListener.clearSawRegionModification();
274 //      // Clear the access state
275 //      localQueryListener.getSawRegionAccess("???");
276 
277 		log.info( "Second set of queries on node0 done" );
278 
279 		// Sleep a bit to allow async repl to happen
280 		sleep( SLEEP_TIME );
281 
282 		// Check if the previous queries replicated
283 		assertEquals( "Query cache remotely modified", 2, remoteQueryListener.getSawRegionModificationCount() );
284 		remoteQueryListener.clearSawRegionModification();
285 
286 		log.info( "Repeat second set of queries on node1" );
287 
288 		// Do queries again from node 1
289 		log.info( "Again query Smith's branch" );
290 		assertEquals( "Correct branch for Smith", "94536", dao1.getBranch( dao1.getSmith(), useNamedRegion ) );
291 		log.info( "Again query Jone's balance" );
292 		assertEquals( "Correct high balances for Jones", 40, dao1.getTotalBalance( dao1.getJones(), useNamedRegion ) );
293 
294 		// Should be no change; query was already there
295 		assertEquals( "Query cache modified", 0, remoteQueryListener.getSawRegionModificationCount() );
296 		assertEquals( "Query cache accessed", 2, remoteQueryListener.getSawRegionAccessCount() );
297 		remoteQueryListener.clearSawRegionAccess();
298 
299 		log.info( "Second set of queries on node1 done" );
300 
301 		// allow async to propagate
302 		sleep( SLEEP_TIME );
303 
304 		// Modify underlying data on node 1
305 		modifyEntities( dao1 );
306 
307 		// allow async timestamp change to propagate
308 		sleep( SLEEP_TIME );
309 
310 		// Confirm query results are correct on node 0
311 		assertEquals( "63088 has correct # of accounts", 7, dao0.getCountForBranch( "63088", useNamedRegion ) );
312 		assertEquals( "Correct branch for Smith", "63088", dao0.getBranch( dao0.getSmith(), useNamedRegion ) );
313 		assertEquals( "Correct high balances for Jones", 50, dao0.getTotalBalance( dao0.getJones(), useNamedRegion ) );
314 		log.info( "Third set of queries on node0 done" );
315 	}
316 
317 	protected void setupEntities(ClassLoaderTestDAO dao) throws Exception {
318 		dao.cleanup();
319 
320 		dao.createAccount( dao.getSmith(), new Integer( 1001 ), new Integer( 5 ), "94536" );
321 		dao.createAccount( dao.getSmith(), new Integer( 1002 ), new Integer( 15 ), "94536" );
322 		dao.createAccount( dao.getSmith(), new Integer( 1003 ), new Integer( 20 ), "94536" );
323 
324 		dao.createAccount( dao.getJones(), new Integer( 2001 ), new Integer( 5 ), "63088" );
325 		dao.createAccount( dao.getJones(), new Integer( 2002 ), new Integer( 15 ), "63088" );
326 		dao.createAccount( dao.getJones(), new Integer( 2003 ), new Integer( 20 ), "63088" );
327 
328 		dao.createAccount( dao.getBarney(), new Integer( 3001 ), new Integer( 5 ), "63088" );
329 		dao.createAccount( dao.getBarney(), new Integer( 3002 ), new Integer( 15 ), "63088" );
330 		dao.createAccount( dao.getBarney(), new Integer( 3003 ), new Integer( 20 ), "63088" );
331 
332 		log.info( "Standard entities created" );
333 	}
334 
335 	protected void resetRegionUsageState(CacheAccessListener localListener, CacheAccessListener remoteListener) {
336 		String stdName = StandardQueryCache.class.getName();
337 		String acctName = Account.class.getName();
338 
339 		localListener.getSawRegionModification( stdName );
340 		localListener.getSawRegionModification( acctName );
341 
342 		localListener.getSawRegionAccess( stdName );
343 		localListener.getSawRegionAccess( acctName );
344 
345 		remoteListener.getSawRegionModification( stdName );
346 		remoteListener.getSawRegionModification( acctName );
347 
348 		remoteListener.getSawRegionAccess( stdName );
349 		remoteListener.getSawRegionAccess( acctName );
350 
351 		log.info( "Region usage state cleared" );
352 	}
353 
354 	protected void modifyEntities(ClassLoaderTestDAO dao) throws Exception {
355 		dao.updateAccountBranch( 1001, "63088" );
356 		dao.updateAccountBalance( 2001, 15 );
357 
358 		log.info( "Entities modified" );
359 	}
360 }
